item.title: Thomas Bryce Kelly
item.description: Iâ€™m an oceanographer and founder of Icy Seas Co-Laboratory. I am also Affiliate Professor at the International Arctic Research Center. The ocean is an amazing place, and I am excited to share my science of the ocean with you. I study how marine ecosystems interact with their physical environment. When not working I spend most of my time either on house projects or with my family our on a trail.
